seo.title: 5SOLO · Five disciplines. One outcome.
seo.description: 5SOLO is a five-in-one studio covering development, design, SEO, media and care to launch your next product fast.

hero.title:
Five experts.
One result.
hero.subtitle: Development, design, SEO, media and care teams working as one to ship revenue-ready MVPs in record time.

about.label: Who we are
about.title: An orchestra of five soloists
about.text: 5SOLO unites development, design, SEO, media and client care. We build lean MVPs, orchestrate growth-ready sites and stay with you after launch to optimise every touchpoint.

services.label: Services
services.title: One studio. Five expert tracks.
services.subtitle: Each track is led by a senior specialist and reinforced by the rest of the collective so you never lose momentum.

dev.title: Solo Dev
dev.description: Product-minded engineering for blazing-fast Next.js builds, integrations and automation.

design.title: Solo Design
design.description: Brand, UI and UX crafted together to convert – responsive, accessible and on brief.

seo.title: Solo SEO
seo.description: Technical audits, keyword journeys and content systems aligned with your funnel.

media.title: Solo Media
media.description: Launch-ready creative, motion and social assets powered by unified brand guidelines.

care.title: Solo Care
care.description: Post-launch optimisation, analytics and retention programmes with clear SLAs.

portfolio.label: Case studies
portfolio.title: A sample of our launch sprints
portfolio.subtitle: We partner with SaaS, eCommerce and content teams that need a reliable production partner.

case1.title: GrowthOS
case1.description: Productised onboarding platform redesigned and shipped in 12 days.

case2.title: Helix Labs
case2.description: Investor-ready biotech story site with interactive data visuals.

case3.title: Nimbus CX
case3.description: Customer care knowledge base with multilingual support workflows.

case4.title: Atlas Media
case4.description: Campaign landing system producing 6 bespoke variations per week.

testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.title: Teams that ship with 5SOLO
testimonials.subtitle: Early-stage founders, CMOs and product leads choose us when they need senior execution without the overhead.

client1.quote: We signed our first enterprise client two weeks after launch. The stack, copy and tracking were ready from day one.
client1.name: Lena H.

client2.quote: Design never outpaced development. Every sprint delivered a usable increment we could demo to stakeholders.
client2.name: Ilya T.

client3.quote: They handled rollout, localisation and SEO migrations as one motion. Our support KPIs improved within the first month.
client3.name: Marina P.

cta.label: Offer
cta.title: MVP-ready website in 10 days
cta.subtitle: Kick-off within 48 hours. Fixed scope, transparent pricing, senior team on every task.

contact.title: Tell us about your launch
contact.subtitle: Share goals, timeline and the channels you need. We respond within one business day.
